metadata.title: CVE-2024-27008 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm: nv04: Fix out of bounds accessWhen Output Resource (dcb->or) value is assigned infabricate_dcb_output(), there may be out of bounds access todac_users array in case dcb->or is zero because ffs(dcb->or) isused as index there.The 'or' argument of fabricate_dcb_output() must be interpreted as anumber of bit to set, not value.Utilize macros from 'enum nouveau_or' in calls instead of hardcoding.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.
